title: Carpe Diem Workshop for Digital Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Process for language education professors to experience student-centered digital learning design using smartphones.

learning_goals: Participants can explain student-customized activity designs using at least three digital tools
Participants can develop one digital language lesson module applying the Carpe Diem methodology
Participants can engage in peer feedback processes using smartphone-based assessment rubrics

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
